price: Ԑberε a Yesu de nyinasoͻ ne nkyerεkyerεmu pefee baeε no ͻkaa sε: “Nokorε mede adwen (anaasε nyansa) abrε mo, na merebεkyerε mo nneεma bi a monte moho ase wͻ ho no ho. Enti monsuro Nyankopͻn na monyε sotie mma me “.
arabic: وَلَمَّا جَآءَ عِيسَىٰ بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ قَالَ قَدۡ جِئۡتُكُم بِٱلۡحِكۡمَةِ وَلِأُبَيِّنَ لَكُم بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي تَخۡتَلِفُونَ فِيهِۖ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walammā jāa ʿīsā bil-bayināti qāla qad ji'tukum bil-ḥik'mati wali-ubayyina lakum baʿḍa alladhī takhtalifūna fīhi fa-ittaqū al-laha wa-aṭīʿūni
